titulo: El amor en los tiempos del Facebook [Love in the Time of Facebook]
descripcion:
What began as a few posts in a public Facebook profile immediately became a phenomenon that brought millions of followers from around the world, requesting Dante write about love every Friday. That's how this series of texts was born, and now they are compiled in this book full of romanticism. 
El amor en los tiempos del Facebook is a story about love, a compilation of notes that come from the heart, based on the most precious gift and the greatest of all virtues: love.
